==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ほん|にん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Possibly from {{der|ja|ltc|-|sort=ほんにん}}, or composed in Japan of {{cog|zhx}} elements: {{m|ja|本|tr=hon||main; real; the one under discussion}} + {{m|ja|人|tr=nin||person}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|本人|tr=běnrén}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|a|ほ|んにん}}<ref name="NHK">{{R:NHK Hatsuon}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[hõ̞ɴnĩɴ]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ほんにん}}

# the person themselves, that [[person]] [[himself]] or [[herself]]
# the person [[in question]], the [[relevant]] person, the person [[concerned]]
